meanings.definition: A person who steers a ship or boat.
meanings.sent1: The helmsperson carefully guided the ship through the stormy seas.
meanings.sent2: The helmsperson adjusted the wheel to keep the boat on course.
meanings.sent3: The helmsperson joked that they were the captain of the sea.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the helmsperson's decisions shaped the fate of the crew.
meanings.sent5: The helmsperson's steady hand at the wheel inspired confidence in the sailors.

meanings.definition: The person in charge of guiding or directing a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: As the helmsperson of the team, she led them to victory.
meanings.sent2: The helmsperson of the company made strategic decisions for growth.
meanings.sent3: The helmsperson organized a fun team-building activity.
meanings.sent4: Her role as helmsperson of the project ensured its success.
meanings.sent5: The helmsperson's vision steered the organization towards success.
